verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> would take up יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And it came to pass when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> Elijah בַּֽסְעָרָ֖ה <S%H5591><s%> by a whirlwind הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> into heaven וַיֵּ֧לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went אֵלִיָּ֛הוּ <S%H452><s%> that Elijah וֶאֱלִישָׁ֖ע <S%H477><s%> with Elisha מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <S%H1537><s%> from Gilgal

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁ֜ע <S%H477><s%> unto Elisha שֵֽׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> Tarry נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please פֹ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> here כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> here I pray thee for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far בֵּֽית־ אֵ֔ל <S%H1008><s%> me to Bethel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [unto him As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5800><s%> I will not leave וַיֵּרְד֖וּ <S%H3381><s%> thee So they went down בֵּֽית־ אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> to Bethel

וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <S%H3318><s%> came forth בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֥ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בֵּֽית־ אֵל֮ <S%H1008><s%> that [were] at Bethel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁע֒ <S%H477><s%> to Elisha וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הֲיָדַ֕עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> unto him Knowest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> thou that the LORD לֹקֵ֥חַ <S%H3947><s%> will take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy master מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7218><s%> from thy head וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Yes אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Yea I know הֶחֱשֽׁוּ׃ <S%H2814><s%> [it] hold ye your peace

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ל֨וֹ אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah אֱלִישָׁ֣ע ׀ <S%H477><s%> unto him Elisha שֵֽׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> tarry נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please פֹ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> here כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> here I pray thee for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> me to Jericho וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5800><s%> I will not leave וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> thee So they came יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> to Jericho

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <S%H5066><s%> came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֥ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בִּֽירִיחוֹ֮ <S%H3405><s%> that [were] at Jericho אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֱלִישָׁע֒ <S%H477><s%> to Elisha וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> to him הֲיָדַ֕עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> unto him Knowest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> thou that the LORD לֹקֵ֥חַ <S%H3947><s%> will take away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנֶ֖יךָ <S%H113><s%> thy master מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7218><s%> from thy head וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Yes אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I יָדַ֖עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> Yea I know הֶחֱשֽׁוּ׃ <S%H2814><s%> [it] hold ye your peace

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ל֨וֹ אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah שֵֽׁב־ <S%H3427><s%> unto him Tarry נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Please פֹ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> here כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> I pray thee here for the LORD שְׁלָחַ֣נִי <S%H7971><s%> hath sent הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <S%H3383><s%> me to Jordan וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD וְחֵֽי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <S%H5315><s%> and [as] thy soul אִם־ <S%H518><s%> I will not אֶעֶזְבֶ֑ךָּ <S%H5800><s%> I will not leave וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went שְׁנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H8147><s%> thee And they two

וַחֲמִשִּׁ֨ים <S%H2572><s%> And fifty אִ֜ישׁ <S%H582><s%> another מִבְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons הַנְּבִיאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets הָֽלְכ֔וּ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> and stood מִנֶּ֖גֶד <S%H5048><s%> to view מֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> afar off וּשְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> and they two עָמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <S%H452><s%> And Elijah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדַּרְתּ֤וֹ <S%H155><s%> his mantle וַיִּגְלֹם֙ <S%H1563><s%> and wrapped [it] together וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters וַיֵּחָצ֖וּ <S%H2673><s%> and they were divided הֵ֣נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וָהֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> and there וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> went over שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> hither and thither so that they two בֶּחָרָבָֽה׃ <S%H2724><s%> on dry

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> become כְעָבְרָ֗ם <S%H5674><s%> And it came to pass when they were gone over וְאֵ֨לִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> that Elijah אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֱלִישָׁע֙ <S%H477><s%> unto Elisha שְׁאַל֙ <S%H7592><s%> Ask מָ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> what אֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> what I shall do לָּ֔ךְ בְּטֶ֖רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before אֶלָּקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> for thee before I be taken away מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <S%H5973><s%> with וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֱלִישָׁ֔ע <S%H477><s%> from thee And Elisha וִֽיהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֛א <S%H4994><s%> Please פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> portion שְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> I pray thee let a double בְּרוּחֲךָ֖ <S%H7307><s%> of thy spirit אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said הִקְשִׁ֣יתָ <S%H7185><s%> a hard thing לִשְׁא֑וֹל <S%H7592><s%> Thou hast asked אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if תִּרְאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> [nevertheless] if thou see אֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> לֻקָּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> me [when I am] taken מֵֽאִתָּךְ֙ <S%H853><s%> יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> become לְךָ֣ כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> shall be so וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> else לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> as they הֹלְכִ֤ים <S%H1980><s%> And it came to pass as they still הָלוֹךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> went on וְדַבֵּ֔ר <S%H1696><s%> and talked וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> behold רֶֽכֶב־ <S%H7393><s%> that behold [there appeared] a chariot אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> of fire וְס֣וּסֵי <S%H5483><s%> and horses אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire וַיַּפְרִ֖דוּ <S%H6504><s%> and parted בֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> asunder שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> them both וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H5927><s%> went up אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> and Elijah בַּֽסְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H5591><s%> by a whirlwind הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> into heaven

וֶאֱלִישָׁ֣ע <S%H477><s%> And Elisha רֹאֶ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> saw וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מְצַעֵק֙ <S%H6817><s%> [it] and he cried אָבִ֣י ׀ <S%H1><s%> My father אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father רֶ֤כֶב <S%H7393><s%> the chariot יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּפָ֣רָשָׁ֔יו <S%H6571><s%> and the horsemen וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no רָאָ֖הוּ <S%H7200><s%> thereof And he saw ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> more וַֽיַּחֲזֵק֙ <S%H2388><s%> him no more and he took hold בִּבְגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> of his own clothes וַיִּקְרָעֵ֖ם <S%H7167><s%> and rent לִשְׁנַ֥יִם <S%H8147><s%> them in two קְרָעִֽים׃ <S%H7168><s%> pieces

וַיָּ֙רֶם֙ <S%H7311><s%> He took up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדֶּ֣רֶת <S%H155><s%> also the mantle אֵלִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H452><s%> of Elijah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that נָפְלָ֖ה <S%H5307><s%> that fell מֵעָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וַיָּ֥שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> from him and went back וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> and stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> by the bank הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan

וַיִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַדֶּ֨רֶת <S%H155><s%> the mantle אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H452><s%> of Elijah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> that נָפְלָ֤ה <S%H5307><s%> that fell מֵֽעָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> from him and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> and said אַיֵּ֕ה <S%H346><s%> Where יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Where [is] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> of Elijah אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yet ה֣וּא ׀ <S%H1931><s%> he וַיַּכֶּ֣ה <S%H5221><s%> had struck אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters וַיֵּֽחָצוּ֙ <S%H2673><s%> they parted הֵ֣נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וָהֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> and there וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> went over אֱלִישָֽׁע׃ <S%H477><s%> hither and thither and Elisha

וַיִּרְאֻ֨הוּ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And when the sons הַנְּבִיאִ֤ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who בִּֽירִיחוֹ֙ <S%H3405><s%> which [were] to view at Jericho מִנֶּ֔גֶד <S%H5048><s%> about וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> him they said נָ֛חָה <S%H5117><s%> doth rest ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The spirit אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H452><s%> of Elijah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אֱלִישָׁ֑ע <S%H477><s%> on Elisha וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> And they came לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <S%H7125><s%> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> him and bowed ל֖וֹ אָֽרְצָה׃ <S%H776><s%> themselves to the ground
